0.text: Innate: Alistar generates a Triumph stack for every enemy  champion he  stuns or  displaces with his abilities, and each time a nearby enemy  minion or non-epic  monster dies. He generates 7 stacks if a nearby enemy champion or epic monster dies.
0.html: Innate: Alistar generates a Triumph stack for every enemy champion he stuns or displaces with his abilities, and each time a nearby enemy minion or non-epic monster dies. He generates 7 stacks if a nearby enemy champion or epic monster dies.
markedPassages: champion
stuns
displaces
minion
monster

1.text: At 7 Triumph stacks, Alistar releases a roar, consuming them to  heal himself for 23 − 142 (based on level) and all nearby allied champions for「 double the amount. 」「 46 − 284 (based on level). 」
1.html: At 7 Triumph stacks, Alistar releases a roar, consuming them to heal himself for 23 − 142 (based on level) and all nearby allied champions for「 double the amount. 」「 46 − 284 (based on level). 」
markedPassages: heal
「 double the amount. 」「 46 − 284 (based on level). 」
「 46 − 284 (based on level). 」

2.text: Triumphant Roar can occur only once every few seconds, though Alistar may still generate stacks before then.
2.html: Triumphant Roar can occur only once every few seconds, though Alistar may still generate stacks before then.

0.text: Active: Alistar slams the ground beneath him, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and  stunning and  knocking them up simultaneously for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Alistar slams the ground beneath him, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and stunning and knocking them up simultaneously for 1 second.
markedPassages: stunning
knocking them up

0.text: Active: Alistar  dashes to the target enemy's location and, if the target is within 400 units upon arrival, he deals them magic damage and  knocks them back 700 units over 0.5 seconds while also  stunning them for 0.75 seconds.
0.html: Active: Alistar dashes to the target enemy's location and, if the target is within 400 units upon arrival, he deals them magic damage and knocks them back 700 units over 0.5 seconds while also stunning them for 0.75 seconds.
markedPassages: dashes
knocks them back
stunning

0.text: Active: Alistar tramples the ground around him every 0.5 seconds over 5 seconds, becoming  ghosted and dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies, as well as generating a Trample stack each time the ability damages at least one enemy champion, up to 5.
0.html: Active: Alistar tramples the ground around him every 0.5 seconds over 5 seconds, becoming ghosted and dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies, as well as generating a Trample stack each time the ability damages at least one enemy champion, up to 5.
markedPassages: ghosted

1.text: At 5 Trample stacks, Alistar's next basic attack against a  champion within 6 seconds is empowered to consume all stacks, end Trample prematurely, and deal 20 − 275 (based on level) bonus magic damage and  stun the target for 1 second.
1.html: At 5 Trample stacks, Alistar's next basic attack against a champion within 6 seconds is empowered to consume all stacks, end Trample prematurely, and deal 20 − 275 (based on level) bonus magic damage and stun the target for 1 second.
markedPassages: champion
20 − 275 (based on level) bonus magic damage
stun

0.text: Active: Alistar  cleanses himself of all  crowd control. For the next 7 seconds, he  reduces all incoming damage taken.
0.html: Active: Alistar cleanses himself of all crowd control. For the next 7 seconds, he reduces all incoming damage taken.
markedPassages: cleanses
crowd control
reduces

+115 movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Reduces movement speed by 90 for 5 seconds while you are in in-combat. This duration can refresh while staying in-combat.
passive.originText: Reduces movement speed by 90 for 5 seconds while you are in in-combat. This duration can refresh while staying in-combat.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • yellow
  • totem
  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+5 ability power
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

Keywords

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.

Stats

+20 ability haste
+200 health
+30 armor
+30 magic resistance

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Devotion: Grant allied champions within 850 radius a shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level), decaying over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – DEVOTION: Grant allied champions within  850 radius a  shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level), decaying over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Consecrate: Grant allied champions within 850 radius 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2 bonus resistances for this item's passive effect, Consecrate.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONSECRATE: Grant allied champions within 850 radius 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.

1.originHTML: +  +  300

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+250 health
+250 mana
+35 armor

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.

1.originHTML: +  +  700

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+200% base health regeneration

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Pledge: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – PLEDGE: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and  heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+350 health
+60 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
